text: (taniyam vankiya) avarkal tam tantaiyitam tirumpi vanta polutu â€˜â€˜enkal tantaiye! (Punyaminaiyum nankal alaittuc cellavittal) enkalukku(t taniyam) alappatu tatukkappattuvitum. Atalal, enkal cakotaranaiyum enkalutan anuppivaippiraka. Nankal taniyam vankik kontu niccayamaka avaraiyum patukattu varuvom'' enru kurinarkal
